description: Partial approval of details pursuant to condition 3 (materials) parts A (concrete GRC and terrazzo cladding), C (external balustrades) and D (windows) of planning permission ref. P2023/2609/FUL dated 27/03/2024.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
Product Samples and Design Documents:
Images of GRC cladding samples, balustrade and windows, Finishes Schedule; Comar Aluminium Systems Brochure; Interpon Gris 2800 Sable; Guardian Glass; Scott Osborn Planning Design Submission Notes; Cover Letter dated 2 October 2024; Future Metal Barely Chalu – Champage PAN 31; Design and Access Statement – Addendum September 2024; Jesmonite Specification, Datasheet and Performance documents. 

Drawings:
GSS_BSF_001_ELE_002 P02 (GSS Typical Bay L01-L03); GSS_BSF_001_ELE_003 P03 (Northburgh Street – L04 Typical Bay); GSS_BSF_001_ELE_004 P02 (Northburgh Street – Typical Bay); GSS_BSF_001_ELE_005 P00 (GSS Typical Bay L04); GSS_BSF_001_ELE_2001 P02 (Typical Details-01); GSS_BSF_001_ELE_2002 P03 (Typical Details-02); DMS-SIM-SD-DRW-EL-09-9001 P01 (Front Elevation Typical Bay Details); HGG-SIM-SD-DRW-EL-09-9002 P01 (South Façade Ground Floor); 13715-PCO-05-DR-A-34401 Revision A (L05 Balustrades – Plans and Elevations); GSS-SIM-EL-DRW-01-9002 P01 (Rear Elevation GRC Identification); GSS-SIM-EL-DRW-01-9001 P01 (Front Elevation GRC Identification); L05 Balustrade – Full Length Revision A; L05 Balustrade Sample Revision A; Northburgh Street Elevation Mark Up; 13715-PCO-DR-A-20200 Revision A (Proposed Elevations).
